title: Marie Mason - Not For Profit
description:
In 1999, Marie Mason put out the powerful neo-folk album, Not for Profit.  
The album features guitarist and Earth First! activist Darryl Cherney, Steve Hesh, Peter Amazing, Che Guevara, Tony Askins, Edie Morris, and Peter Childs.

In 2008, Marie was indicted for multiple acts of environmental sabotage and is now serving more than 20 years in prison.  Like other important folk musicians such as Pete Seeger, Phil Ochs, and Utah Phillips, Marie believed in practicing what she sang.  See supportmariemason.org.  

NOT FOR PROFIT track listing:

1. The End of the World
2. Using You
3. All Used Up
4. Take It Down
5. The Tree
6. Tienemen Square
7. The RCP Song
8. Not For Profit
